Subject: Open Port 22
Description:
Hello, We need to get port 22 opened on this box. It is currently not able to communicate with our inventory management tool.
Needing to get our netwrix box ( 10.92.2.153)to talk bilaterally with 10.92.2.139 over port 22
What_We_Know__c: The customer wants us to create a service account for them.
Next_Steps__c:
Checking with devops if the service account can be created or if an NDA is needed
Asked the customer if he agrees to sign the NDA for the secondary account
Followed up in order to ask the customer if he agrees to sign the NDA for the secondary account
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer wanted to use Azure agent on the EPP Server, but this would require to create a new user for the customer.
The customer did not want to sign the NDA so the ticket can be closed.
